body_html:
When trying to
$ brew uninstall libtool && brew install libtool

It displays the message:

Error: The `brew link` step did not complete successfully
The formula built, but is not symlinked into /usr/local
Could not symlink include/libltdl
/usr/local/include is not writable.

Create the folder (if not exist) and take ownership of it:
$ sudo mkdir /usr/local/include
$ sudo chown -R $USER:admin /usr/local/include

Create the symlink:
$ brew link libtool

Now try to build:
$ tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_ios_protobuf.sh
than
$ tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_ios_tensorflow.sh

I managed to compile tensorflow now.
I have observed only some deprecation warnings like this one:
warning: 'OSAtomicAdd32' is deprecated: first deprecated in macOS 10.12

Many thanks for help!

When trying to
$ brew uninstall libtool && brew install libtool
It displays the message:
Error: The `brew link` step did not complete successfully
The formula built, but is not symlinked into /usr/local
Could not symlink include/libltdl
/usr/local/include is not writable.

Create the folder (if not exist) and take ownership of it:

$ sudo chown -R $USER:admin /usr/local/include
Create the symlink:
$ brew link libtool
Now try to build:
$ tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_ios_protobuf.sh
than
$ tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_ios_tensorflow.sh
I managed to compile tensorflow now.
I have observed only some deprecation warnings like this one:
warning: 'OSAtomicAdd32' is deprecated: first deprecated in macOS 10.12
Many thanks for help!
body:
When trying to 
`$ brew uninstall libtool && brew install libtool`

It displays the message:

```
Error: The `brew link` step did not complete successfully
The formula built, but is not symlinked into /usr/local
Could not symlink include/libltdl
/usr/local/include is not writable.
```

Create the folder (if not exist) and take ownership of it:
`$ sudo mkdir /usr/local/include`
`$ sudo chown -R $USER:admin /usr/local/include`

Create the symlink:
`$ brew link libtool`

Now try to build:
`$ tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_ios_protobuf.sh`
than
`$ tensorflow/contrib/makefile/compile_ios_tensorflow.sh`

**I managed to compile tensorflow now.**
I have observed only some deprecation warnings like this one:
`warning: 'OSAtomicAdd32' is deprecated: first deprecated in macOS 10.12`

Many thanks for help!
